title: How to Cook Frozen Waffles

steps.headline: Get your supplies out.
steps.description: You'll need the waffles, plates, a knife or spatula, and some oven mitts.

steps.headline: Take the grill out of the oven.
Turn the oven/broiler on to medium heat.
Put the grill back in the oven.
steps.description: Leave the broiler/grill part of the oven slightly open.

steps.headline: Watch the waffles.
steps.description: Make sure they don't burn. They can cook quickly!

steps.headline: Once they look golden, put your oven mitts on and take the grill back out.
Flip the waffles over with a butter knife or spatula, and put the grill back in.
Watch the waffles until they look cooked.
steps.description: Then carefully put them on a plate.

text: Get your supplies out. You'll need the waffles, plates, a knife or spatula, and some oven mitts. Take the grill out of the oven. Put the waffles on it. Turn the oven/broiler on to medium heat. Let it warm slightly. Put the grill back in the oven. Leave the broiler/grill part of the oven slightly open. Watch the waffles. Make sure they don't burn. They can cook quickly! Once they look golden, put your oven mitts on and take the grill back out.  Flip the waffles over with a butter knife or spatula, and put the grill back in.  Watch the waffles until they look cooked. Then carefully put them on a plate. Finished.
